DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the safety of the autologous transplantation of adipose-derived stem cells in the treatment of lipodystrophies.
DOC.brief_title: Autologous Adipose-Derived Stem Cell Transplantation in Patients With Lipodystrophy
DOC.criteria: lipodystrophies with necessity of fat grafting accept to participate of the study HIV infection Metastatic malignancy Body mass index < 20 kg/mÂ² Other severe systemic disease
